question: 合繊
sourceMnemonic:
<kanji>Fiber</kanji>s you <kanji>join</kanji> together to make more, stronger fibers, they turn into <vocabulary>synthetic fiber</vocabulary>s.

Note that this is an abbreviation of the specialist term <ja>合成繊維</ja>, and it mostly comes up in industrial contexts.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
